statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-6 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x - 2 , 3 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x - 4 , 2 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x , x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} + x - 4 , -17 \, x^{2} + x + 8\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
